title: Getting Started with React
summary: Learn the basics of React and how to create your first component.
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It makes it painless to create interactive UIs...

title: Next.js for Beginners
summary: An introduction to Next.js and its benefits over plain React.
content: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering and generating static websites for React-based web applications...

title: TypeScript with React
summary: Understand how to use TypeScript to write type-safe React components.
content: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript. When used with React, it provides better IDE support and fewer runtime errors...
